mapper.select: select Count(*) from time_trial_record where uid = #{uid};
select Count(*) from time_trial_user_map where uid = #{uid};
mapper.update: create table time_trial_rank_${cid} as select * from (select user_rank.*, @rank_num := @rank_num + 1 as rank_num from ( select * from (select uid, min(complete_time) as complete_time from time_trial_record where cid = ${cid} and complete_time != -1 group by uid) as min_time order by complete_time asc ) as user_rank, (select @rank_num:= 0) r) as all_user_rank;
mapper.select: select exists( select id from time_trial_user_map where uid = #{uid} and cid = #{cid});

select complete_time from ( select record.*, @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rownum from ( select uid, complete_time from time_trial_record where uid = #{uid} and cid = #{cid} order by complete_time asc ) as record, (select @rownum:= 0) r ) as history_rank where rownum = 1 and complete_time != -1;
